# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the struct member.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **Metal Shading Language Guide**
- **Metal Programming Guide**

## Describing the struct member

- **dataType**: The data type of the struct member.
- **offset**: The location of this member relative to the start of its struct, in bytes.
- **argumentIndex**: The index in the argument table that corresponds to the struct member.
